commands.setup: python3 -m venv venv . venv/bin/activate pip install -e . pip install -r dev-requirements.txt
commands.precommit: ruff check --fix . black --preview . isort --profile black . pyright pytest
commands.tools:
pip install $NEW_DEPENDENCY Install a new dependency. Remember to update requirements.txt or dev-requirements.txt as appropriate.
pytest -k $TEST_NAME Run a specific test or group of tests matching the given name.
pytest --cov=mentat Run tests with coverage report for the mentat package.
black --check --preview . Check if the code is formatted according to Black without making changes.
isort --profile black --check-only . Check if imports are sorted correctly without making changes.
python setup.py sdist bdist_wheel Build distribution packages for the project.
twine upload dist/* Upload the built distribution packages to PyPI. Make sure you have the necessary credentials.
cd testbed && mentat Run Mentat from the testbed directory to ensure it's working correctly when installed.
